postpin.name: Welcome to the website
postpin.contents:
This is the official TGG website hosted on vercel!.
The source code for this website is avaliable on github at The source code for this website is avaliable on github at github.com/alexthe-canadian/tggweb

post7.name: Recent bug fixes
post7.contents:
I changed how posts are done so i dont have to change all the ids when i add a new one.
I have also fixed the email redirection bug (i forgot the mailto in front of the url)
